properties.name: Racial Restrictions
properties.formula: if(indexOf("Dwarf",race)==0,"Class may not be Magic-User or Necromancer; Minimum Constitution 9; Maximum Charisma 17; May not employ weapons longer than 4 feet",if(indexOf("Elf",race)==0,"Minimum Intelligence 9; Maximum Constitution 17; Never roll larger than a 6-sided die for hit points.",if(indexOf("Halfling",race)==0,"Class may not be Magic-User or Necromancer; Minimum Dexterity 9; Maximum Strength 17; Never roll larger than a 6-sided die for hit points; May not use Large weapons; Must wield Medium weapons with both hands",if(indexOf("Chelonian",race)==0,"Minimum Constitution 11; Maximum Dexterity 17. Requires specially-constructed armors",if(indexOf("Half-Elf",race)==0,"Minimum Intelligence 9; Maximum Constitution 17",if(indexOf("Half-Ogre",race)==0,"Cleric or Fighter classes only; Minimum Strength and Constitution 13; Maximum Intelligence and Wisdom 15",if(indexOf("Half-Orc",race)==0,"Minimum Constitution 9,; Maximum Intelligence 17",if(indexOf("Gnome",race)==0,"May only become Clerics, Fighters, Magic-Users, Thieves, or Magic-User/Thieves; Minimum Constitution 9; Maximum Strength 17; Never roll larger than a 6-sided die for hit points; May not employ weapons longer than 4 feet",if(indexOf("Bisren",race)==0,"Prefer Ranger, Druid, Fighter, or Cleric class; Thieves have penalties indoors, underground, or in urban areas, -10% to Open Locks, Remove Traps, Pick Pockets, -20% to Move Silently and Hide; Minimum Strength and Constitution 11, Maximum Dexterity and Intelligence 17; Require specialized armor, helmets, and footwear",if(indexOf("Canein",race)==0,"Can be any class, but are rarely Thieves; Minimum Constitution 9, Maximum Intelligence 17",if(indexOf("Faun",race)==0,"Minimum Constitution 9; Maximum Charisma 15; Require special foot-wear",if(indexOf("Phaerim",race)==0,"Often Rangers or Druids; Minimum Dexterity 9; Minimum Charisma 11; Maximum Strength 15; May not use Large weapons, wield Medium weapons two-handed",if(indexOf("Dhampir",race)==0,"Cannot be Cleric; Minimum Strength, Dexterity, Constitution 9; -1 AC in daylight; Cannot rest and heal without drinking 1 quart of blood per week; Take +2 damage from silver or fire attacks; -10% to XP",if(indexOf("Drakkanor",race)==0,"May not become Magic-Users; Minimum Strength 9; Maximum Charisma 17; Special fitted armor required",if(indexOf("Felisian",race)==0,"May not become Magic-Users; Minimum Dexterity 9; Maximum Strength 17",if(indexOf("Ravenkin",race)==0,"Special Armor required; Minimum Wisdom and Intelligence 11; Taking max hit die damage has 1 in 6 chance of shattering bone, see Rules",if(indexOf("Carven",race)==0,"May not become Thieves; Minimum Intelligence 9; Maximum Charisma 17; Healing potions only half effective; Must Save vs. Dragon Breath for all fire attacks, see Rules",if(indexOf("Wanderwoods",race)==0,"May not become Magic-Users; Minimum Constitution 9; Maximum Charisma 17; May not wear armor; Must Save vs. Dragon Breath for all fire attacks, see Rules; Requires sunlight and water once every 2 days",if(indexOf("Human",race)==0,"None","see Rules")))))))))))))))))))

properties.name: Racial Special Abilities
properties.formula: if(indexOf("Dwarf",race)==0,"Dwarf Detection: able to detect slanting passages, traps, shifting walls and new construction on a roll of 1-2 on 1d6, a search must be performed before this roll may be made.",if(indexOf("Elf",race)==0,"Has 1 in a 6-sided die chance to find secret doors with a cursory look; Immune to paralyzing attack of ghouls; Less likely to be surprised, reducing the chance by 1 in a 6-sided die chance",if(indexOf("Halfling",race)==0,"Gains +1 Attack Bonus with ranged weapons; +2 AC when attacked in melee by creatures larger than man-sized; +1 to Initiative; Hide Outdoors 90% Success; Hide Indoors 70% Success",if(indexOf("Chelonian",race)==0,"Base AC 13 due to thick skin, base AC 17 for back shell, can hold breath twice as long as humans, and underwater vision two times better than humans",if(indexOf("Half-Elf",race)==0,"Gain +5% bonus to XP, except if a combination class",if(indexOf("Half-Ogre",race)==0,"HD one size larger; Gain +5% bonus to XP;+1 Strength Bonus",if(indexOf("Half-Orc",race)==0,"Gain +5% bonus to XP;+1 Charisma Bonus",if(indexOf("Gnome",race)==0,"Gains +1 AC when attacked in melee by creatures larger than man-sized;10% chance to detect invisible or hidden creatures within 30 foot radius, if an invisible creature is detected, only -2 penalty to attack roll",if(indexOf("Bisren",race)==0,"HD one size larger; Special Charging/Gore attack, +2 to hit with double damage; +1 Strength Bonus; Thieves Find and Remove outdoor traps with +10% bonus",if(indexOf("Canein",race)==0,"Keen sense of smell, able to detect concealed or invisible creatures, combat penalties for them are halved; Can track as a Ranger of equivalent level, Canein Rangers have a bonus of +20%; +2 to reaction rolls for other canine creatures",if(indexOf("Faun",race)==0,"Resistant to charm-like effects of fey beings, getting a +4 bonus on relevant saves",if(indexOf("Phaerim",race)==0,"Limited flight, see rules; Hide Outdoors 90% Success; Hide Indoors 70% Success",if(indexOf("Dhampir",race)==0,"Only 1-in-6 chance of being surprised; Regenerate 2 HP per day; Base movement rate of 50 ft; May jump up to 10 ft vertically or 20 ft horizontally when running; Can bite for 1d 3 damage; see Rules on Charming; +4 against charm effects",if(indexOf("Drakkanor",race)==0,"Gains +2 AC; Can attack with claws and breathing fire 3 times daily, see Rules",if(indexOf("Felisian",race)==0,"Quick reflexes result in only half damage from falls, successful Saving throw results in only quarter damage; Can attack with claws, see Rules; climbing and jumping 20 ft, see Rules",if(indexOf("Ravenkin",race)==0,"If Cleric, considered +1 level;if not Cleric, can Turn Undead as level one; If level 1, can use Cleric saving throws if better; Can glide with wings, see Rules",if(indexOf("Carven",race)==0,"Gain +1 AC; HD one size larger; Can blend in with trees, see Rules",if(indexOf("Wanderwoods",race)==0,"Natural AC 14; Can blend in with trees, see Rules; Immune to Charm Person spell; May Speak with Plants (as per spell) once per day",if(indexOf("Human",race)==0,"Gain +10% bonus to XP","see Rules")))))))))))))))))))
